name: Bomber
description: While attacking a ship, each of your <critical/> icons add a damage to the damage total and you can resolve a critical effect.

name: Counter 1
description: After a squadron performs a non-COUNTER attack against you, you may attack that squadron with an anti-squadron armament of 1 blue dice, even if you are destroyed.

name: Counter 2
description: After a squadron performs a non-COUNTER attack against you, you may attack that squadron with an anti-squadron armament of 2 blue dice, even if you are destroyed.

name: Escort
description: Squadrons you are engaged with cannot attack squadrons that lack ESCORT unless performing a COUNTER attack.

name: Grit
description: You are not prevented from moving while you are engaged by only 1 squadron.

name: Heavy
description: You do not prevent engaged squadrons from attacking ships or moving.

name: Intel
description: While an enemy squadron is at distance 1 of you, it has HEAVY.

name: Rogue
description: You can move and attack during the Squadron Phase.

name: Swarm
description: While attacking a squadron engaged with another squadron, you may reroll 1 die.
